name: GHOSTS 'N MINI-KENS
description:
An arcade classic with a twist!

Trouble arises when Ryu, the King of the Demon World, swoops in to take Princess Chun-Li away. It's up to the heroic Ken Masters to save the day!

Experience Ghosts 'n Goblins in a whole new way as your favorite Street Fighter shotokan! Fight through the game's first three levels, beating up baddies, pulling off special moves.

Arthur's sitting this one out!

* No lances or daggers here! Collect gems to power up your moves!

* Hadoken, shoryuken, and hurricane kick your way through hordes of enemies!

* Keyboard and Xbox controller support! PS4 controller support available with DS4Windows.

All art, characters, and music are property of Capcom Co., Ltd. This is a free game not affiliated with Capcom Co., Ltd. or Taito Corporation.
